channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5214] Manufacturer Store Overview // Wrong display of special characters
item.description:
There seems to be a problem with showing of special characters in the manufacturer store.
In the HMC it is ok.
item.summary: Manufacturer Store Overview // Wrong display of special characters

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5207] After Login, set initial password still displayed
item.description:
A new contact is registered to a existing online customer. After activation of the profile the initial password is set. The picture in the attachment is displayed.
From my view the user should be re-directed to the home screen otherwise he will try again to set the initial password.
item.summary: After Login, set initial password still displayed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Raphael,
Could you please add a redirect to home in that case?

Please set the redirect on "My Account"
B2C:
https://test.distrelec.de/my-account/login-data
B2B:
https://test.distrelec.de/my-account/company/information
@Urs: Please check again after the deployment of today evening

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5200] SalesOrg required for manufacturer punchout?
item.description:
Hi Raphael
We already discussed the fact, that manufacturer punchout spec does not meet the implementation. I tried to get an answer from Evangelos last Friday but he was too busy.
In order to have this interface working, I changed the implementation to meet the spec. (SalesOrg is part of the CSV file)

However, if you want to remove SalesOrg...

  • please check with Evangelos whether SalesOrg is obsolete in the punchout definition
  • update the spec
  • organize the modification in the CSV file
  • update the mapping in distrelecB2Bcore-spring-integration-erp.xml

But we can also keep the SalesOrg in the CSV and close this ticket without any further changes.

Cheers, Adi

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Evangelos: As discussed the SalesOrg is not part of this interface. So Please forward that to your developers to take out the sales organisation column. For more details see: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-05+PunchOut+Filters

SAP change is open and needs to be implemented.
@Evangelos: Please just fix it for D and Q, the transport for P will happen when we go live/prelive with the v3.0 for DE

Hello Ligia,
Could you please update the IF05 related brand (manufacturer) so we remove the sales organization completely? Please send to Maciej afterwards.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5196] Case 1, B2B (C1) - Add new login/contact to online customer
item.description:
Existing customer not found.

Customer ID: 1241412
Customer name: Sonova
item.summary: Case 1, B2B (C1) - Add new login/contact to online customer

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: As discussed it is a new contact for an existing online customer.

There is a strange situation in HP Quality system for customer 0001241412.
There are two B2BUnit that share the same customerID.

This is causing an exception while updating the customer and the unit.

Why there is the same customer ID for two different customers?
@Urs: Please test again, after the deployment

Hi Raphael
Now we are one step further.
After registration of the new contact in the shop I get the attached E-Mail to the address of the new contact but this mail should be sent to the customer service instead.
Sorry, this was a configuration issue. I will fix that within the next deployment.

Hi Raphael
Same issue in case of C4 Activate existing offline contact of existing online customer for online. Wrong E-Mail sent to the new contact.
The fix is not yet deployed.
@Urs: Please check again after the deployment of today evening

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5189] Not possible to record a delivery address
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.4
Safari 7.0.6

https://test.distrelec.de/checkout/address

Registered as B2C, while check out process, to declare a delivery address is not possible.
item.summary: Not possible to record a delivery address

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5168] Test DE // Disable the Payment & Shipping options into My account
item.description: please disable the possibility that the customer is able to change the default shipping and payment options into My Account
item.summary: Test DE // Disable the Payment & Shipping options into My account

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Ruben, could you please remove the menu in the my account section (screenshot)

Hi Oana,
Is it also okay when keep the menu only for editing the shipping conditions?
We can remove payment conditions there.

According to Evangelos, as well the shipping conditions cannot be changed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5148] SAP // Remove payment code conversion ELFA SAP - NEW SAP
item.description:
Hi Evangelos

Please remove the payment code conversion aligned with:
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistPaymentMethod
item.summary: SAP // Remove payment code conversion ELFA SAP - NEW SAP

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hello Ligia,
Could you please let me know what will happen in our interfaces if we remove the mapping from the map table for the payment methods? Are we going to export just the Elfa value or not?

Hi Evangelos,

If you simply delete the mapping we will have an issue in the IF11 interface where we raise error if no mapping is found.
For the others will be returned the ELFA value.

You could just maintain the z-table with the original values (make "From value" = "To value") and in this way you will be sure that no errors will be returned.
Second solution would be to implement the necessary corrections.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Hello Raphael,
Could you please update the below payment terms in the hybris side?
000 Cash
004 Prepaid by card
006 Prepayment
008 8 days net
010 10 days net
015 15 days net
021 21 days net
030 30 days net
060 60 days net
090 90 days net
120 120 days net

@Evangelos: I have updated the list here https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistPaymentMethod
So you can disable the mapping on Elfa SAP D, so that we can test that. Thanks.
There is a problem with the Elfa system and we cannot transfer the changes to Q. HP is probably working on it.
OK. Give me an update when the transfer is done. On hybris side everything is changed and we expect now the "old" code.

Codes have been updated in the Q system of Elfa.
Please test and let me know for transporting them also into production
@Evangelos: It is working. The transport to P has to take place on the GoLive date of DE or on the preGoLive. I created a ticket with transports that need to be done on this date. (DISTRELEC-5230)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4259] OCI - Hide settings link from header
item.summary: OCI - Hide settings link from header

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The settings link is maintained in the CMS. It has been added to CH, IT and AT, but not to any ELFA country (yet).
Raphael, is it even possible tohide it for OCI customers but not for for normal customers?
fixed, will be available after next deployment.
